name: Drone Back Home
description:
You are a little quadcopter drone on a picturesque mission to capture photos for your owner, but you connection got lost! You must return to home in order to save your pilot hundreds of dollars! Be quick, you only have a limited battery life!

  •  WASD to move laterally, Q and E to rotate
  •  Use the arrow on screen to find your way back home to the landing pad
  • Return to home before the battery runs out

It is recommended to fullscreen for the best experience (so your screen is not covered by the giant battery)

This game was made for the WPI Touch Tomorrow Game Jam, and it fits the theme since the  drone has to return back home.
